data.message: I'm just an old lady who's opinion might not be one that matters to the masses and I may not agree with every single word Mr. Mathers utters, but I will go to my grave saying that Eminem is the most brilliant artist I ever listened to.  True genius in his field.💞💞💞

replies.message: I'm an old lady too and I agree 100%!
Never old for the artistry of this kind!
I used to agree until i heard the new song hes done with beyonce utter rubbish :(

Wendy...its one song... Does that mean we discredit all of his work? No. Some people actually like it...so your opinion is just an opinion. What is your objective here? To win people over to your opinion? Waste of time...once an opinion is formed its not going to change. So, negativity in these posts are pointless. If someone is a fan of the music, they can give support... That's not wasting time, because you are being polite...something this world needs more of.

Wendy Wright this probably is his intro to the new album, very classy and sets the tone. Sorry it's not a t-pain apple bottom jeans rip, us Em fans have a more sophisticated pallet ever since we started our worship👐
Amen my old lady sister. This old lady feels exactly the same way.

Another old lady here to agree with you!  I’m pretty sure there are lots of artists out there who put out music that people don’t like.   Not everyone has the same taste.  I’ve bought plenty of albums over the years from all different kinds of artists and to be honest there are usually several I end up not liking but I don’t stop listening to that artist because of it.  I just don’t listen to the songs I don’t like.  Why do people have to condemn so much any more?  Why can’t people just not listen to what they don’t like or not watch what they don’t want to see or ignore social media posts they don’t agree with and not comment or blast the hell out of people?  I just don’t get the world anymore!!  Sorry rant over.
2 Much Oldies. They Listen 2 Eminem's Song In The Underworld. So Do Not Worry
I do not get the hate for this song. It gave me chills. I felt for him.
I could relate this song to life. I'm with the other "old" ladies. Same age as Eminem. And with Kelly Williams. The song gave me chills.
